num: #project cards, t is color type 1 - green, 2 - blue, 3 - event, 0 - stanard project, 4 - corp, 5 - prelude

name: Colonizer Training Camp
tooltip: Oxygen must be 5% or less.

name: Deep Well Heating
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step. Increase temperature 1 step.

name: Cloud Seeding
tooltip: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Decrease your MC production 1 step and any heat production 1 step.  Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Search For Life
ac: Action: Spend 1 MC to reveal and discard the top card of the draw deck. If that card has a microbe tag, add a science resource here.
tooltip: Oxygen must be 6% or less. 3 VPs if you have one or more science resource here.

name: Martian Rails
ac: Action: Spend 1 energy to gain 1 MC for each city tile ON MARS.

name: Capital
tooltip: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Place [the capital city] tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your MC production 5 steps. 1 ADDITIONAL VP FOR EACH OCEAN TILE ADJACENT TO THIS CITY TILE.

name: Asteroid
tooltip: Raise temperature 1 step and gain 2 titanium. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

name: Comet
tooltip: Raise temperature 1 step and place an ocean tile. Remove up to 3 plants from any player.

name: Big Asteroid
tooltip: Raise temperature 2 steps and gain 4 titanium. Remove up to 4 plants from any player.

name: Water Import From Europa
ac: Action: Pay 12 MC to place an ocean tile. TITANIUM MAY BE USED as if playing a space card.
tooltip: 1 VP for each Jovian tag you have.

name: Equatorial Magnetizer
ac: Action: Decrease your energy production 1 step to increase your terraforming rating 1 step.

name: Domed Crater
tooltip: Oxygen must be 7% or less. Gain 3 plants and place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase MC production 3 steps.

name: Noctis City
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your MC production 3 steps. Place a tile ON THE RESERVED AREA, disregarding normal placement restrictions.

name: Methane From Titan
tooltip: Requires 2% oxygen. Increase your heat production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps.

name: Imported Hydrogen
tooltip: Gain 3 plants, or add 3 microbes or 2 animals to ANOTHER card. Place an ocean tile.

name: Research Outpost
ac: Effect: When you play a card, you pay 1 MC less for it.
tooltip: Place a city tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE.

name: Phobos Space Haven
tooltip: Increase your titanium production 1 step and place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA.

name: Black Polar Dust
tooltip: Place an ocean tile. Decrease your MC production 2 steps and increase your heat production 3 steps.

name: Arctic Algae
ac: Effect: When anyone places an ocean tile, gain 2 plants.
tooltip: It must be -12°C or colder to play. Gain 1 plant.

name: Predators
ac: Action: Remove 1 animal from any card and add it to this card.
tooltip: Requires 11% oxygen. 1 VP per animal on this card.

name: Eos Chasma National Park
tooltip: Requires -128°C  or warmer. Add 1 animal TO ANY ANIMAL CARD. Gain 3 plants. Increase your MC production 2 steps.

name: Cupola City
tooltip: Oxygen must be 9% or less. Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your MC production 3 steps.

name: Lunar Beam
tooltip: Decrease your MC production 2 steps and increase your heat production and energy production 2 steps each.

name: Optimal Aerobraking
ac: Effect: When you place a space event, you gain 3 MC and 3 heat.

name: Underground City
tooltip: Place a city tile. Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your steel production 2 steps.

name: Regolith Eaters
ac: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbe from this card to raise oxygen level 1 step.

name: GHG Producing Bacteria
ac: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes to raise temperature 1 step.
tooltip: Requires 4% oxygen.

name: Ants
ac: Action: Remove 1 microbe from any card to add 1 to this card.
tooltip: Requires 4% oxygen. 1 VP per 2 microbes on this card.

name: Release of Inert Gases
tooltip: Raise your terraform rating 2 steps.

name: Nitrogen-Rich Asteroid
tooltip: Raise your terraforming rating 2 steps and temperature 1 step. Increase your plant production 1 step, or 4 steps if you have 3 plant tags.

name: Rover Construction
ac: Effect: When any city tile is placed, gain 2 MC

name: Deimos Down
tooltip: Raise temperature 3 steps and gain 4 steel. Remove up to 8 plants from any player.

name: Asteroid Mining
tooltip: Increase your titanium production 2 steps.

name: Food Factory
tooltip: Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your MC production 4 steps.

name: Archaebacteria
tooltip: It must be -18°C or colder. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Carbonate Processing
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 3 steps.

name: Natural Preserve
tooltip: Oxygen must be 4% or less. Place this tile NEXT TO NO OTHER TILE. Increase your MC production 1 step.

name: Nuclear Power
tooltip: Decrease your MC production 2 steps and increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Algae
tooltip: Requires 5 ocean tiles. Gain 1 plant and increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Adapted Lichen
tooltip: Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Fish
ac: Action: Add 1 animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires 2°C or warmer. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

name: Lake Marineris
tooltip: Requires 0°C or warmer. Place 2 ocean tiles.

name: Small Animals
ac: Action: Add 1 animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Kelp Farming
tooltip: Requires 6 ocean tiles. Increase your MC production 2 steps and your plant production 3 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Beam From a Thorium Asteroid
tooltip: Requires a Jovian tag. Increase your heat production and energy production 3 steps each.

name: Mangrove
tooltip: Requires +4°C or warmer. Place a Greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN and raise oxygen 1 step. Disregard normal placement restrictions for this.

name: Trees
tooltip: Requires -4°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 3 steps. Gain 1 plant.

name: Mining Expedition
tooltip: Raise oxygen 1 step. Remove 2 plants from any player. Gain 2 steel.

name: Mining Rights
tooltip: Place [the mining] tile on an area with a steel or titanium placement bonus. Increase that production 1 step.

name: Birds
ac: Action: Add an animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires 13% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 2 steps. 1 VP for each animal on this card

name: Towing a Comet
tooltip: Gain 2 plants. Raise oxygen level 1 step and place an ocean tile.

name: Space Mirrors
ac: Action: Spend 7MC to increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Solar Wind Power
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step and gain 2 titanium.

name: Ice Asteroid
tooltip: Place 2 ocean tiles.

name: Giant Ice Asteroid
tooltip: Raise temperature 2 steps and place 2 ocean tiles. Remove up to 6 plants from any plyer.

name: Ganymede Colony
tooltip: Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA [for Ganymede Colony]. 1 VP per Jovian tag you have.

name: Giant Space Mirror
tooltip: Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Grass
tooltip: Requires -16°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 3 plants.

name: Heather
tooltip: Requires -14°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step. Gain 1 plant.

name: Peroxide Power
tooltip: Decrease your MC production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Bushes
tooltip: Requires -10°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Greenhouses
tooltip: Gain 1 plant for each city tile in play.

name: Nuclear Zone
tooltip: Place [the nuclear zone] tile and raise the temperature 2 steps.

name: Fueled Generators
tooltip: Decrease your MC production 1 step and increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Ironworks
ac: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 steel and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Power Grid
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step for each power tag you have, including this.)

name: Steelworks
ac: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 2 steel and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Ore Processor
ac: Action: Spend 4 energy to gain 1 titanium and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Open City
tooltip: Requires 12% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your MC production 4 steps. Gain 2 plants and place a city tile.

name: Solar Power
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Breathing Filters
tooltip: Requires 7% oxygen.

name: Artificial Photosynthesis
tooltip: Increase your plant production 1 step or your energy production 2 steps.

name: Artificial Lake
tooltip: Requires -6°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile ON AN AREA NOT RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

name: Geothermal Power
tooltip: Increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Farming
tooltip: Requires +4°C or warmer. Increase your MC production 2 steps and your plant production 2 steps. Gain 2 plants.

name: Dust Seals
tooltip: Requires 3 or less ocean tiles.

name: Urbanized Area
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your MC production 2 steps. Place a city tile ADJACENT TO AT LEAST 2 OTHER CITY TILES.

name: Moss
tooltip: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 1 plant. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: GHG Factories
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your heat production 4 steps.

name: Subterranean Reservoir
tooltip: Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Ecological Zone
ac: Effect: When you play an animal or a plant tag (including these 2), add an animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires that you have a greenery tile. Place [the Ecological Zone] tile ADJACENT TO ANY GREENERY TILE. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Zeppelins
tooltip: Requires 5% oxygen. Increase your MC production 1 step for each city tile ON MARS.

name: Worms
tooltip: Requires 4% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for every 2 microbe tags you have, including this.

name: Decomposers
ac: Effect: When you play an animal, plant, or microbe tag, including this, add a microbe to this card.
tooltip: Requires 3# oxygen. 1 VP per 3 microbes on this card.

name: Fusion Power
tooltip: Requires 2 power tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Symbiotic Fungus
ac: Action: Add a microbe to ANOTHER card.
tooltip: Requires -14°C or warmer.

name: Extreme-Cold Fungus
ac: Action: Gain 1 plant or add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card.
tooltip: It must be -10°C or colder.

name: Advanced Ecosystems
tooltip: Requires a plant tag, a microbe tag, and an animal tag.

name: Great Dam
tooltip: Requires 4 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Strip Mine
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 2 steps. Increase your steel production 2 steps and your titanium production 1 step. Raise oxygen 2 steps.

name: Wave Power
tooltip: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Lava Flows
tooltip: Raise the temperature 2 steps and place this [the Lava Flow] tile ON EITHER THARSIS THOLUS, ASCRAEUS MONS, PAVONIS MONS OR ARSIA MONS.

name: Power Plant
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Mohole Area
tooltip: Increase your heat production 4 steps. Place [the Mohole Area] tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN.

name: Large Convoy
tooltip: Place an ocean tile and draw 2 cards. Gain 5 plants, or add 4 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Tectonic Stress Power
tooltip: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your energy production 3 steps.

name: Nitrophilic Moss
tooltip: Requires 3 ocean tiles and that you lose 2 plants. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Herbivores
ac: Effect: When you place a greenery tile, add an animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires 8% oxygen. Add 1 animal to this card. Decrease any plant production 1 step. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.

name: Insects
tooltip: Requires 6% oxygen. Increase your plant production 1 step for each plant tag you have.

name: Insulation
tooltip: Decrease your heat production any number of steps and increase your MC production the same number of steps.

name: Adaptation Technology
ac: Effect: Your global requirements are +2 or -2 steps, your choice in each case.

name: Designed Microorganisms
tooltip: It must be -14°C or colder. Increase your plant production 2 steps.

name: Nitrite Reducing Bacteria
ac: Action: Add 1 microbe to this card, or remove 3 microbes to increase your TR 1 step.
tooltip: Add 3 microbes to this card.

name: Industrial Microbes
tooltip: Increase your energy production and your steel production 1 step each.

name: Lichen
tooltip: Requires -24°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Convoy From Europa
tooltip: Place 1 ocean tile and draw 1 card.

name: Imported GHG
tooltip: Increase your heat production 1 step and gain 3 hear.

name: Imported Nitrogen
tooltip: Raise your TR 1 step and gain 4 plants. Add 3 microbes to ANOTHER card and 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Micro-Mills
tooltip: Increase your heat production 1 step.

name: Magnetic Field Generators
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 4 steps and increase your plant production 2 steps. Raise your TR 3 steps.

name: Shuttles
ac: Effect: When you play a space card, you pay 2MC less for it.
tooltip: Requires 5% oxygen. Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your MC production 2 steps.

name: Import of Advanced GHG
tooltip: Increase your heat production 2 steps.

name: Windmills
tooltip: Requires 7% oxygen. Increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Tundra Farming
tooltip: Requires -6°C or warmer. Increase your plant production 1 step and your MC production 2 steps. Gain 1 plant.

name: Aerobraked Ammonia Asteroid
tooltip: Add 2 microbes to ANOTHER card. Increase your heat production 3 steps and your plant production 1 step.

name: Magnetic Field Dome
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 2 steps and increase your plant production 1 step. Raise your terraform rating 1 step.

name: Pets
ac: Effect: When any city tile is placed, add an animal to this card.  Animals may not be removed from this card.
tooltip: Add 1 animal to this card. 1 VP per 2 animals here.

name: Protected Valley
tooltip: Increase your MC production 2 steps. Place a greenery tile ON AN AREA RESERVED FOR OCEAN, disregarding normal placement restrictions, and increase oxygen 1 step.

name: Noctis Farming
tooltip: Requires -20°C or warmer. Increase your MC production 1 step and gain 2 plants.

name: Water Splitting Plant
ac: Action: Spend 3 energy to raise oxygen 1 step.
tooltip: Requires 2 ocean tiles.

name: Heat Trappers
tooltip: Decrease any heat production 2 steps and increase your energy production 1 step.

name: Soil Factory
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your plant production 1 step.

name: Ice cap Melting
tooltip: Requires +2°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Biomass Combustors
tooltip: Requires 6% oxygen. Decrease any plant production 1 step and increase your energy production 2 steps.

name: Livestock
ac: Action: Add 1 animal to this card.
tooltip: Requires 9% oxygen. Decrease your plant production 1 step and increase your MC production 2 steps. 1 VP for each animal on this card.

name: Aquifer Pumping
ac: Action: Spend 8 MC to place 1 ocean tile. STEEL MAY BE USED as if you were playing a building card.

name: Flooding
tooltip: Place an ocean tile. IF THERE ARE TILES ADJACENT TO THIS OCEAN TILE, YOU MAY REMOVE 4 MC FROM THE OWNER OF ONE OF THOSE TILES.

name: Energy Saving
tooltip: Increase your energy production 1 step for each city tile in play.

name: Local Heat Trapping
tooltip: Spend 5 heat to either gain 4 plants, or to add 2 animals to ANOTHER card.

name: Permafrost extraction
tooltip: Requires -8°C or warmer. Place 1 ocean tile.

name: Plantation
tooltip: Requires 2 science tags. Place a greenery tile and raise oxygen 1 step.

name: Immigration Shuttles
tooltip: Increase your MC production 5 steps. 1 VP for every 3rd city in play.

name: Immigrant City
ac: Effect: Each time a city tile is placed, including this, increase your MC production 1 step.
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step and decrease your MC production 2 steps. Place a city tile.

name: Underground Detonations
ac: Action: Spend 10 MC to increase your heat production 2 steps.

name: Soletta
tooltip: Increase your heat production 7 steps.

name: Rad-Chem Factory
tooltip: Decrease your energy production 1 step. Raise your terraform rating 2 steps.

name: Special Design
tooltip: The next card you play this generation is +2 or -2 in global requirements, your choice.
